user_query: I'm planning a trip to London and I need information about local authorities and planning applications. Can you provide me with the URLs for local authority and planning application searches? Additionally, I would like to know the energy performance certificate (EPC) rating for a property. Please provide the URL for the domestic EPC search.

TaskList.description: Retrieve the URL for local authority searches related to London.
Retrieve the URL for planning application searches in London.
Fetch the URL for the domestic Energy Performance Certificate (EPC) search.
